oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Lipase catalyzed asymmetric synthesis of (R)-melonol
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: SYAM, S
RANE, MD
BHAT, SV
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: ants
asymmetric synthesis
melonol
lipases
transesterification
hydrolysis
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Synthesis of optically pure 2,6-dimethyl-5-hepten-l-ol(melonol) has been attempted using lipases. Among three different lipases tested, pig panereatic lipase (PPL) is found to be suitable for transesterification of (+/-)-melonol to afford (R)-(+)-melonol with an enantiomeric excess of 94%.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: INDIAN JOURNAL OF CHEMISTRY SECTION B-ORGANIC CHEMISTRY INCLUDING MEDICINAL CHEMISTRY, 47(8), 1308-1310
